definition: Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican

sentences.english: It is also said in the Vedas that Brahman is beyond mind and words.
sentences.chinese: 《吠陀經》也說梵天超越思想和語言。

sentences.english: Some of the villagers thought Birth had occurred.
sentences.chinese: 有的鄉下佬以爲梵天已經降生。
梵天給予了他這一神靈保佑。

sentences.english: What Brahman is cannot be described in words.
sentences.chinese: 梵天是無法用語言來描述。

sentences.english: That Brahma is bereft of sense.
The Divine Mother and Brahman are one.
sentences.chinese: 神聖母親和梵天是一體。

sentences.english: The Heaven of the Great Brahma Lord is where the Great Brahma Lord lives.
sentences.chinese: 是大梵天王所住的地方，壽命60小劫。

sentences.english: Brahman weeps, entrapped in the snare of the five elements.
sentences.chinese: 梵天被誘捕到五種元素的陷阱裏，他哭泣着。

sentences.english: Prajapati was later identified with the puranic Brahma.
sentences.chinese: 生主後來被視作星學上的梵天。

sentences.english: Brahman is the only Real Existence.
sentences.chinese: 梵天是唯一的真正存在。

sentences.english: Only one thing has not been defiled in this way, and that is Brahman .
sentences.chinese: 只有一樣事物沒有受過這種污染，那就是梵天。

sentences.english: But no one has been able to describe Brahman. It is therefore unpolluted .
sentences.chinese: 可是沒有人能夠描述梵天，因此梵天不受污染。

sentences.english: But no one has been able to describe Brahman. It is therefore unpolluted .
sentences.chinese: 可是沒有人能夠描述梵天，因此梵天不受污染。

sentences.english: Therefore I say that in the light of Vedantic reasoning Brahman has no attributes.
sentences.chinese: 所以我說根據吠檀多的推論，梵天沒有屬性。

sentences.english: At that time venerable Brahmadeva's mother, a Brahmin woman was steadfastly making adoration to Brahma with out stretched arms.
sentences.chinese: 五其時，尊者梵天之母婆羅門女，常以供牲供梵天。

sentences.english: At that time venerable Brahmadeva's mother, a Brahmin woman was steadfastly making adoration to Brahma with out stretched arms.
sentences.chinese: 五其時，尊者梵天之母婆羅門女，常以供牲供梵天。

definition: honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
the intersection of the Moon's orbit with the ecliptic in Vedic astronomy (Sanskrit rahu)
